#include<stdlib.h>
#include<stdint.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<stdio.h>
/*int inline inp()
{
    int n=0;
    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c < '0' || c >'9') {c=getchar_unlocked();}
    while(c>='0' && c<='9')
    {
    n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+c-'0';
    c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return n;
}*/
long long int sum(int n)
{
    return ((long long int)(n))*((long long int)(n+1))/2;
}
int main()
{
    int n,i=1,j;
    long long int g=0;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    while(n/i-n/(i+1)>1)
    g+=i*(sum(n/i)-sum(n/(++i)));
    for(j=1;j<=n/i;j++)
    g+=(j*(n/j));
    printf("%lld\n",g);
    return 0;
}
